name: Recurscape VR
description:
You're trapped in a strange room, the only way to escape is to play a VR game within the game, in that VR game you will have to play yet another 2d side scroller game to find the clue to escape :)

Game developed by solo dev for the VR Jan Jam

Assets Used:

Safe/Fireplace: Antique Victorian furniture

2D art: canva.com

VR Headset model: https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/vr-headset-simple-3d-model-1344937#

Hands: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/hands-for-vr-basic-54532

SoundFX: freesound.org
